context.title: DetailView
context.description: This View shows the details of a review or comment. It also conducts for changing or deleting a shown review/comment.

context.title: CommentSummaryView
context.description: This view shows a (selected) set of all comments of the selected review. It tries to provide most of the informations which are needed within a comment.

context.title: ReviewExplorer
context.description: This view shows the reviewsand its including folders and files.
